channel.title: Sketchfab.com - TheOuterLinux Channel
channel.description: Using free and open source software to create 3D models

item.title: Hakem from "Game of Death"
item.description:
Kareem Abdul-Jabbar starred in a Bruce Lee movie called "Game of Death" in 1972 as the character Hakim. What a lot of people don't know is that there is an alternate vesion of the fight between Hakim and Billy Lo (Bruce Lee). In that version, Hakim is a vampire, hence this 3D model's red eyes behind the sunglasses. He kind of looks like Broussard from "The Coloney" (TV series 2016).
Patreon: https://patreon.com/theouterlinux
Find me: https://twitter.com/theouterlinux https://mastodon.social/@TheOuterLinux https://theouterlinux.tumblr.com https://theouterlinux.artstation.com https://twitch.tv/theouterlinux https://picarto.tv/theouterlinux

item.title: Evil Pixie
item.description:
I didn't really have anything in mind when I started making this, but it turned out to be a red feathered, pixie-like creature made with Blender and the ManuelBastioniLABS addon. I gave her vampire-like teeth and some awesome skull accessories.
Patreon: https://patreon.com/theouterlinux

item.title: Adventure Time - Marceline
item.description:
Made an anime-like vesion of Marceline from Adventure time using Blender and the ManuelBastioniLAB addon. The bass guitar is a little different, but technically more accurate even if was originally a battle axe first. No textures used and only ten materials, but I technically could have got it down to eight.
Patreon: https://patreon.com/theouterlinux
Find me: https://twitter.com/theouterlinux https://mastodon.social/@TheOuterLinux https://theouterlinux.tumblr.com https://theouterlinux.artstation.com https://twitch.tv/theouterlinux https://picarto.tv/theouterlinux
